item.title: Annette add a quote by J.R. Ward
item.description: "I was dead until you found me, though I breathed. I was sightless, though I could see. And then you came...and I was awakened." -- J.R. Ward

item.title: Annette add a quote by David Eddings
Annette add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Old enough to know better, pissed enough not to care. (Jaden)" -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Annette add a quote by Anne Bishop
item.description: "A woman with an education may be able to spend more time sitting in a chair instead of lying on her back. A sound advantage, I should think." -- Anne Bishop

item.title: Annette add a quote by Anne Bishop
item.description: "Everything has a price." -- Anne Bishop

item.title: Annette add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Just because you can doesn't mean you should." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Annette add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Over, under, around, or through. There is always a way. - Soteria" -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Annette add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description:
"Relax. You're in good hands. Tabby wont hurt you.
She stabbed me!
Damn! I told her not to stab any more Hunters. I hate it when she does that." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Annette add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "I'm loved by some, hated by many, envied by most, yet wanted by all. (Josiah)" -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Annette add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "People with weaknesses get killed by the people who lack them. Notice I'm not dead." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Annette add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Sometimes things have to go wrong in order to go right." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Annette add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Remember, if the time should come when you have to make a choice between what is right and what is easy, remember what happened to a boy who was good, and kind, and brave, because he strayed across the path of Lord Voldemort. Remember Cedric Diggory." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Annette add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Annette add a quote by Miss Piggy
item.description: "Beauty is in the eye of the beholder and it may be necessary from time to time to give a stupid or misinformed beholder a black eye." -- Miss Piggy

item.title: Annette add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "A day without sunshine is like, you know, night." -- Steve Martin

item.title: Annette add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Annette add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The story so far: In the beginning the Universe was created. This has made a lot of people very angry and been widely regarded as a bad move." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Annette add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "The main reason Santa is so jolly is because he knows where all the bad girls live." -- George Carlin

item.title: Annette add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Annette add a quote by Isaac Asimov
item.description: "The most exciting phrase to hear in science, the one that heralds the most discoveries, is not "Eureka!" (I found it!) but 'That's funny..." -- Isaac Asimov

item.title: Annette add a quote by Einstein
item.description: "Once you can accept the universe as matter expanding into nothing that is something, wearing stripes with plaid comes easy." -- Einstein

item.title: Annette add a quote by Charlaine Harris
item.description: "If there were an international butt competition, Eric would win, hands downâ€”or cheeks up." -- Charlaine Harris

item.title: Annette add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "Always end the name of your child with a vowel, so that when you yell the name will carry." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Annette add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Annette add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Annette add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Annette add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "The trouble with having an open mind, of course, is that people will insist on coming along and trying to put things in it." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Annette add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt." -- Charles M. Schulz

item.title: Annette add a quote by Anthony G. Oettinger
item.description: "Time flies like an arrow; fruit flies like a banana." -- Anthony G. Oettinger

item.title: Annette add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "May the forces of evil become confused on the way to your house." -- George Carlin
